properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 7:35PM CST until February 16 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the
following rivers in Mississippi...
Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee affecting Clay County

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee.
* until Sunday morning.
* At  6:30 PM Tuesday the stage was 27.5 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 23.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 28.5 feet
tomorrow morning.
* Flood history...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.3 feet
on Feb 28 2009.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 48 hours.

Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected between 8 and 10 AM.

NWSheadline: Forecast flooding increased from Minor to Moderate severity
